Total_Links:
Record High Profit:LTF achieved its highest-ever consolidated Profit After Tax (PAT) of ₹2,644 crore for FY25, a 14% year-on-year growth.

Strong Q4FY25 Performance:The company reported a PAT of ₹636 crore for Q4FY25, up 15% year-on-year.

Dividend Announcement:LTF declared a final dividend of ₹2.75 per equity share for FY25, the highest dividend declared by the company to date.

Retail Book Growth:The retail loan book reached ₹95,180 crore, a 19% year-on-year increase, now constituting 97% of the total loan book.

Retail Disbursements:Annual retail disbursements for FY25 were ₹60,040 crore, up 11% year-on-year.

Key Business Segment Growth:Farmer Finance disbursements grew by 16% year-on-year, and Personal Loans by 42% year-on-year.

Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials (PCAF):LTF joined PCAF, demonstrating its commitment to measuring and disclosing financed emissions using the PCAF methodology.

Acquisition of Gold Loan Business:LTF entered into an agreement with Paul Merchants Finance Private Limited to acquire their gold loan business, aiming to expand its secured loan portfolio.

Digital Transformation:The company launched a new, customer-centric website as part of its digital transformation strategy.

GSTR-1/1A Compliance:As of May 2025, the third phase of HSN code reporting in GSTR-1/1A was implemented, requiring taxpayers to select HSN codes from a dropdown list and introducing auto-populated item descriptions.

GST Refund Process Changes:Key modifications to the GST refund application process were introduced for specific claim types, including export of services with tax payment and supplies to SEZ units/developers with tax payment.

Strong Collection Efficiency:LTF maintained a high collection efficiency of 99.6% in Tamil Nadu.

Project Cyclops Implementation:The AI-ML-based credit rating engine, Project Cyclops, was successfully implemented, reducing risk costs in the two-wheeler portfolio.

L&T Finance Holdings Limited's (LTF) latest updates as of May 1, 2025, primarily revolve around its strong financial performance in Q4FY25 and FY25, strategic initiatives, and industry collaborations.
